name: ASAuthorizationSecurityKeyPublicKeyCredentialProvider
desc: A mechanism for providing public key credential requests to an app or service with a physical security key.

items.name: init(relyingPartyIdentifier: String)
items.desc: Creates the object with a relying party identifier.

items.name: var relyingPartyIdentifier: String
items.desc: The domain name of the service to authorize against.

items.name: func createCredentialAssertionRequest(challenge: Data) -> ASAuthorizationSecurityKeyPublicKeyCredentialAssertionRequest
items.desc: Creates an assertion request with a challenge.

items.name: func createCredentialRegistrationRequest(challenge: Data, displayName: String, name: String, userID: Data) -> ASAuthorizationSecurityKeyPublicKeyCredentialRegistrationRequest
items.desc: Creates an assertion request with a challenge, display name, and user ID.
